text: Psi1 Aurigae is a red supergiant star in the constellation Auriga. It is over 700 times larger than the Sun.https://arxiv.org/abs/1905.10694 It is 7,500 light years away from Earthhttps://arxiv.org/abs/2208.00211 and moving away from us at over 4 kilometers per second.https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/1999VeARI..35....1W == References == Category:Supergiants Category:Red giants
title: Psi1 Aurigae
